review: Perfect ... Don't know what I'd do without it! Netflix lovers out there this is the thing to have!
author: Tracie Hernandez

review: Doesn't work.  Laptop will not stream to me TV. Followed directions many times.
author: Jaclyn Eve Miller "Jaclyn E."

review: Love it. Easy to install and once plugged in all I have to do to watch neflix, is to switch to HDMI 2 and watch the show controlled by my Ipad.
author: Marina Torpin "M"

review: its so easy to set up and use so do not be afraid or scratch it off before you even give it a thought just because you are not tech wizard. Just plug it in and it just guides you through. I gave it to a friend as a gift and they love it so it is also a good gift option for the price.  Good for watching youtube work out videos right on your TV and also obivoulsy netflix and other tv apps like showtime, hbo and timewarner. Its your phone, ipad, computer, streaming video right on your TV. Thats it!
author: hellokitty

review: Pros:Works great.Good connection.Cheap priceCons:Should only be purchased for people who are somewhat tech savvy. Do not purchase it for an old person. They will lose their mind trying to figure it out.
author: Alianny Diazalejo

review: Works really well on my regular 42" LED flat screen TV.  It is actually faster than my new LED 60" Smart TV.  Highly recommend it if you have an HDMI port.
author: Dario
